SEARCH
Package utils

Annotation Interface Utility

@Documented @Retention(SOURCE) @Target(TYPE) public @interface Utility
A utility type, i.e., these should be final classes, with private constructors and all static methods. Keep in mind that utility classes are not really OO and you should always avoid having classes with static methods.

For instance: 

 
 @Utility
 final class Numbers{
      private Numbers() {
              //ensure utility
      }

      public static int add(int a, int b) {
              return a + b;
      }
 }
